3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Excellent isometric projection with consistent wall thickness and clean cutaway geometry.

geometric_accuracy.notes: Core layout of Kitchen, Dining, and Central Hall is accurate. The bay window/window seat on the right is simplified to a flat wall with windows.

interior_elements.notes: Appliances and furniture are logically placed according to the plan; Kitchen island and dining set are well-scaled.

visual_clarity.notes: Very clean rendering; minor deduction for missing window frame details, but structural readability is high.

detected_errors.description: The angled bay window area near the window seat is rendered as a straight wall.

summary: A highly accurate and clean 3D isometric conversion that faithfully translates the complex architectural floor plan into a readable 3D model.
